data.title: Kairos
data.content:
Kairos
=============== 

![Image 1](https://static.scarf.sh/a.png?x-pxid=051a8a26-af2c-4a22-a7d6-dba22bef829f)

[Kairos](https://kairos.io/)

*   [Documentation](https://kairos.io/docs/)
*   [Community](https://kairos.io/community/)
*   [Blog](https://kairos.io/blog/)
*   [dev](https://kairos.io/#)
    
    *   [dev](https://kairos.io/docs)
    *   [v3.3.1](https://kairos.io/v3.3.1/docs)
    *   [v3.2.4](https://kairos.io/v3.2.4/docs)
    *   [v3.1.3](https://kairos.io/v3.1.3/docs)
    
*   *   Ubuntu 24.04
        *   Alpine 3.19
        *   Debian Bookworm
        *   Debian Testing
        *   Fedora 40
        *   openSUSE Leap-15.6
        *   openSUSE Tumbleweed
        *   Rockylinux 9
        *   Ubuntu 24.10
        *   Ubuntu 24.04
        *   Ubuntu 22.04
        *   Ubuntu 20.04
    
    *    
        *   Business use  
            
            If you are using Kairos for business purposes, please allow us to collect anonymous usage data. By leaving this option enabled, some of the download links will go through Scarf, which help us understand project adoption.
            
            Scarf purges personally identifiable information immediately after metadata lookup, ensuring that no sensitive data is stored. It is a GDPR-compliant and used amoung different projects in the CNCF like Linkerd, Falco and others. You can learn more about it on [scarf.sh](https://scarf.sh/).
            
        *   Personal use
*   *   Light
    *   Dark
    *   Auto

More than an edge OS
====================

Transform your Linux system and preferred Kubernetes distribution into a secure bootable image for your edge devices.

[Quick Start](https://kairos.io/docs/getting-started/) [![Image 2: github star](https://kairos.io/index/star.svg)Star us on GitHub](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos)

![Image 3: main logo](https://kairos.io/index/armadillo.png)

Check outour latest release

Latest release

[master](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos/releases/tag/master)

Downloads

![Image 4: kairos ubuntu logo](https://kairos.io/img/kairos-ubuntu-logo.png)

[X86 version](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos/releases/download/master/kairos-ubuntu-24.04-standard-amd64-generic-master-k3sv1.32.1+k3s1.iso) RPi4 version

Copied

Please use the following docker command:

docker pull quay.io/kairos/ubuntu:24.04-standard-arm64-rpi4-master-k3sv1.32.1-k3s1-img

You can find more information: [here](https://kairos.io/docs/reference/image_matrix/#image-flavors)

Copy Command Close

![Image 5: kairos fedora logo](https://kairos.io/img/kairos-fedora-logo.png)

[X86 version](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos/releases/download/master/kairos-fedora-40-standard-amd64-generic-master-k3sv1.32.1+k3s1.iso)

![Image 6: kairos alpine logo](https://kairos.io/img/kairos-alpine-logo.png)

[X86 version](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos/releases/download/master/kairos-alpine-3.19-standard-amd64-generic-master-k3sv1.32.1+k3s1.iso) RPi4 version

Copied

Please use the following docker command:

docker pull quay.io/kairos/alpine:3.19-standard-arm64-rpi4-master-k3sv1.32.1-k3s1-img

You can find more information: [here](https://kairos.io/docs/reference/image_matrix/#image-flavors)

Copy Command Close

[See other download alternatives](https://kairos.io/docs/reference/image_matrix/#image-flavors)

![Image 7: wrapped armadillo logo](https://kairos.io/img/wrapped-armadillo.png)

Welcome to Kairos 
------------------

Build custom bootable-OS images for your edge devices from your choice of OS and Kubernetes distribution.

[Watch this CNCF Webinar to meet Kairos](https://www.cncf.io/online-programs/cncf-on-demand-webinar-meet-kairos-an-oss-project-building-the-immutable-kubernetes-edge/)

Hot off the press
-----------------

See how we're collaborating with Intel and Spectro Cloud on the new Secure Edge-Native Architecture

![Image 8: spectro intel logo](https://kairos.io/img/spectro-intel.png)

[Read more](https://www.spectrocloud.com/news/spectro-cloud-launches-the-secure-edge-native-architecture-sena)

Check us out in this The New Stack article by our maintainer, Ettore di Giacinto

![Image 9: the New Stack logo](https://kairos.io/img/theNewStack.png)

[Read more](https://thenewstack.io/honey-i-secured-your-boot-edge-trusted-boot-with-kairos/)

Learn how to use the famous OSS project, LocalAI, with Kairos and K3s on your nodes

![Image 10: k8sgpt kubernetes superpowers logo](https://kairos.io/img/k8s-superpowers.png)

[Read more](https://thenewstack.io/looking-for-a-k3os-alternative-choosing-a-container-os-for-edge-k8s/)

What makes Kairos different?
----------------------------

![Image 11: swirl logo](https://kairos.io/img/swirl.png)

### Customizable to Your Needs

With Kairos, you're in the driver's seat. Build custom bootable-OS images for your edge devices from your choice of OS and Kubernetes distribution. These images are delivered as container images, and can be customized and extended to your needs. Kairos fits neatly into your CI/CD pipelines and lets you use the container engine of choice.

![Image 12: security logo](https://kairos.io/img/security.png)

### Consistent and Secure

Say goodbye to inconsistencies across your clusters as each node boots from the same immutable image, ensuring uniformity. It also reduces the risk of malicious attacks, and with data encryption, your stored data remains protected, providing enhanced security for your clusters.

![Image 13: rocket logo](https://kairos.io/img/rocket.png)

### Easy  
to Install

We believe in making things simple. With Kairos, you can set up nodes via QR code, manually, remotely via SSH, interactively or with Kubernetes.

![Image 14: box logo](https://kairos.io/img/box.png)

### Optimized for  
Kubernetes

Kairos is optimized for running Kubernetes workloads, and Upgrades can be also done via Kubernetes. However - can also be used as a standard Linux distribution. The configuration management is done via cloud-init.

We are a Cloud Native Computing Foundation sandbox project.
-----------------------------------------------------------

![Image 15: opened box](https://www.cncf.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/cncf-white-logo.svg)The Linux Foundation® (TLF) has registered trademarks and uses trademarks. For a list of TLF trademarks, see [Trademark Usage](https://www.linuxfoundation.org/trademark-usage/).

Join our community
------------------

Whether you're a part of a DevOps team, an IT engineer, a hobbyist, or a maker, we welcome you to join us in driving forward our vision of a secure, decentralized, and containerized edge.

[Contribute on GitHub](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos)[Follow us on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/kairos-oss/)[Join the conversation](https://slack.cncf.io/#kairos)

Enterprise Support
------------------

Need a hand? For enterprise support, get in touch with companies ready to help you tackle the toughest challenges.

![Image 16: Spectro Cloud Logo](https://kairos.io/img/spectrocloud-light.svg)

Spectro Cloud is the main supporter behind Kairos and provides enterprise-grade Kubernetes management through its platform, Palette, which allows organizations to deploy, manage, and scale Kubernetes across various environments, including public clouds, data centers, bare metal, and edge computing.

[Contact](mailto:kairos@spectrocloud.com)

Adopters
--------

DeEEP Network uses Kairos under the hood of their device to offer a highly secure system with trusted boot.

![Image 17: spectro intel logo](https://kairos.io/img/deeep-network.png)

[Read more](https://www.deeep.network/)

Are you using Kairos for your product or within your company? We want to hear from you!

![Image 18: the New Stack logo](https://kairos.io/img/your-logo-here.png)

[Contact us](mailto:members@kairos.io)

[![Image 19: opened box](https://kairos.io/img/opened-box.png) ### Installation See how to get up and running with Kairos, in less than 15 minutes!](https://kairos.io/docs/installation/)[![Image 20: shell](https://kairos.io/img/shell.png) ### Architecture Get inside Kairos, from the factory to P2P mesh capabilities.](https://kairos.io/docs/architecture/)[![Image 21: origami bird](https://kairos.io/img/origami-bird.png) ### Examples Stretch your wings with best practices of common tasks after installing Kairos.](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos/tree/master/examples)

![Image 22](https://static.scarf.sh/a.png?x-pxid=051a8a26-af2c-4a22-a7d6-dba22bef829f)

![Image 23: Kairos Logo](https://kairos.io/index/footer-logo.png)

Project supported by [![Image 24: Spectro-Cloud-logo](https://kairos.io/img/spectrocloud-dark.svg)](https://spectrocloud.com/)

Follow us

[](https://www.linkedin.com/company/kairos-oss/)[](https://github.com/kairos-io/kairos)[](https://www.youtube.com/@Kairos-IO)
